ygData.subject: Re: On Tinkering books
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Flameless Lanterns? Nothing really. If you re a human and don t have dual weild, it s good. as bright as a Lightstone (Not greater) and shows up on your
ygData.messageBody:
Enigma wrote:

> From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>
> I checked EVERY NPC IN and Around Akanon there are no others with books (On
> Fen Ro at least). What is the big deal about the flameless lantern?? Why
> is it better than a normal. Also A Bower says we can make improved
> longbows for them.
>
> <-- Enigma -->
> Tech Supervisor of The Door ISP
> http://members.door.net/enigma
> UIN:364996

Flameless Lanterns? Nothing really. If you're a human and don't have dual
weild, it's good.
as bright as a Lightstone (Not greater) and shows up on your character.

-Zikkin

p.s.
We can't make the bow. We can make the CAMS, they make the bow with the Cams
we make.
At least that's what I've heard.
